item.title: Starting My Journey
item.description: Starting My Journey Welcome to my digital playground! My name is Kez, and I’m thrilled to share my journey into the fascinating world of game design. This is a zero-to-hero adventure, as I start with no prior experience in the art of game design/development. About Me I’ve always been captivated by the magic of video gamesâ€”the mesmerizing visual effects (VFX), the immersive music, and the stunning scenery that games showcase. These elements create an atmosphere that transports players to different worlds, and I aspire to be a part of crafting such experiences.
